Author: Ruicosta.ac
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: The ClearCost project wants to make the travel industry more affordable by lowering prices for accommodation in hotels. This project will target those with a desire for benefits, those who use crypto, and those who wish to save on travel.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: Exactly!  You can become a member of the club for money, paying an annual fee on the site. However, getting the membership with CCWT tokens is ABOUT FOUR TIMES MORE PROFITABLE, and this ratio will grow.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: Six differences between ClearCost and an average ICO project  1. Product  An average ICO project most often has a complex product that requires additional development and implementation. ClearCost already has a working MVP (hotel booking service) with a clear and transparent business model.  2. Benefit  An average ICO project promises multiple-times benefit, but without justification. ClearCost benefit is simple and clear: it’s 4-8 times more beneficial to use CCWT tokens than fiat money to pay for the service subscription. The economic basis for the growth of the token price is the cost of the subscription in the fiat money. The cost of the subscription in the token is falling, but in fiat money is growing, so the market value of the token is increasing.  3. Market  Market of most ICO projects is well researched (from marketing angle), but not tested in practice yet. The ClearCost’s market is dynamically developing and tested in practice.  4. Risks  It’s a matter of long discussions and disputes, but the main risk of ICO projects is that the project will not be launched. As for ClearCost, the risk of non-launching is extremely low, since the first version of the service is already working, and people are served.  5. Capital raising goals  Usually, the average ICO project raises funds to develop the product itself and its infrastructure. At the same time, ClearCost raise funds to improve the existing service and to promote it among cryptocurrencies users.  6. And the last, but not the least – the role of a cryptocurrency  In average ICO projects, the role of a cryptocurrency is to attract investment. In ClearCost project, it’s creating of a network of users, since our cryptocurrency – CCWT tokens – is one of the ways to pay the service subscription fee.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: TECHNICAL AND LEGAL USE OF CCWT TOKENS   For each of the service companies, the Operator of Distributed Registry creates a wallet. Buyers transfer CCWT tokens to these wallets using the ERC20 protocol. Service companies track the receipt of tokens and in their own systems to increase the buyer's rights to receive goods or services at cost price.  For example, the First Service Company extends the subscription period on Clearcost.club.  Optionally, the Operator may use the API and inform the Service Company about the tokens’ transfer.

See more about benefits of buying ClearCost tokens, CCWT, at https://medium.com/clearcost/we-invite-all-the-gbyte-holders-to-take-part-in-our-project-545214d93fc1

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: Dear sirs,     Development of our project is going under the Road Map.  The operation of an automated reservation system has started; Club members are supported in English and Russian.  However, for promotion with the Pools they requested more time. Therefore, we have extended the ITO by one month until November 30, 2018.  We apologize for that but believe that this will not cause nobody any damage, because we will need at least a month for the listing.  If you wanted to use tokens for booking hotels at cost price - contact us, and we will add you a term of membership.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: The idea of creating a discount club for crypto-enthusiasts turned out to be wrong.  Low demand from the community, funds and pools Only a few tourists bought tokens to buy the club membership. We extended the term of one month, trying to sell tokens through pools. But none of the pools did not sell our tokens, three of them sent a review: "Blockchain is not needed in this project."  The only fund that was interested in CCWT and had an investment contact, in view of the situation, also agreed with the lack of prospects.  The market The market is extremely negative right now.  The result Therefore, in this regard, we see no point in issuing tokens - in these conditions, We suppose, when entering the stock exchange, the price of them will drop to zero.  For buyers and partners We will compensate money to all buyers of our tokens or provide membership in the club of their choice. To those who helped us, we will provide vouchers for many years of membership in the club, sufficient for themselves, all their friends and acquaintances, and even for sale. We will do this before December 15, 2018.  You can ask questions to our Telegram group, which will work at least until the end of 2019.  The future The company - operator of tokens will be dissolved. The first service company will continue to book hotels at cost. It already works and serves tourists.   Thanks and apologies We thank everyone who was interested in our project and helped us.  We did our best to make it happen. We are sorry that we did not succeed.  On behalf of the team, Pavel Malyshev and Shura Zhukova

Author: SMSCHAIN
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: This is global international project. Project mission is to allow consumers to receive goods and services at cost. Project Essence reflected in the name ClearCost (i.e. price without markup): we do not include the costs of advertising and super-profits in our prices, as our competitors do. Project will include different services, the first one is hotel booking. The goal of this service is to make travel more affordable by lowering the price of accommodations in hotels (depending on the hotel and the region, from 6% to 15%; in some cases, up to 25%).  Calculate your profit, learn more and try the service https://clearcost.club/ Buy tokens https://clearcost.io Follow https://www.facebook.com/ClearCostClub/  WHITEPAPER https://www.clearcost.io/WP-en.pdf FAQ https://www.clearcost.io/FAQ-en.pdf

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: You probably know that many companies work for many years without profit or even with a loss (for example, Uber). Their goal is attracting loyal customers, seizing market share, increasing capitalization. All this is expensive and is not available for startups without a large initial capital. In addition, sellers can make up-sales: tourists book not only hotels, but also cars, tickets, excursions, and buy insurance.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: We add small money (3%-4.85% of the supplier's price) for compensation our spends, more than half of which is the bank's commission for acquiring cards. Our competitors have an extra charge of 15% or more. And we are not only "middleman": tourists can not have our prices, because b2b service providers do not serve tourists.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: Since we already sold tokens to tourists, we do not need to spend any more money on advertising to attract them.  Cost price = provider'sprice + our spends. We take small money (3%-4.85% of the supplier's price) for compensation our spends, more than half of which is the bank's commission for acquiring cards and another part - salary costs, office rent etc. And we earn money for additional services: car rentals,  excursions,  insurance etc.

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: CLEARCOST SERVICE BECOMES MORE PROFITABLE!  We try to make the ClearCost service as profitable and understandable to our users as  possible, so we decided to modernize the business model.  Previously, customers purchased tokens, which provided the right to receive a unit of service (night at the hotel) at cost. So the idea that followed was - the more tokens you buy, the more nights you can book. A minimum package of 57 tokens was allowed for a five year period during which you can book approximately 75 nights.  The new business model of ClearCost looks like this: The minimum package of tokens (and its cost) remained unchanged - 57 CCWT, but now it's enough for the SIX-YEAR CLUB SUBSCRIPTION. The annual subscription entitles you to book PRACTICALLY AN UNLIMITED number of nights at the cost price (no more than 365 per year).  In addition, we decided to enter the European markets country-by-country and therefore we increase the deadline for token sale until October 31; this was approved by all the backers and investors.  As it was before, you can pay fiat money on our website; there, annual fee is $ 45.   However, becoming a member of the club using CCWT is four times more profitable, and this profit will only grow.  57 tokens now cost less than $ 50. Thus, it is possible to recoup the entire subscription period on the first trip, if it is  expensive enough.    Take more benefit with ClearCost!

Author: ClearCost
Title: [ANN][ITO] LAUNCH OF THE WORLD COMMITTEE OF CLEAR COST PROMOTION
Body: Clear Cost starts bounty campaign and We invite you to take part in it!  The Bounty has 51,775 CCWT tokens, which everyone can receive for certain actions and then use or sell on the stock market. Particular attention in the campaign is given to blogs and facebook. There are also several mandatory conditions for participating in the campaign.  Joining ClearCost Instagram, Telegram and Facebook is obligatory for the participation in ClearCost bounty campaign. Instagram link: https://www.instagram.com/clearcostclub Telegram link: http://t.me/clearcostclub Facebook link: https://www.facebook.com/ClearCostClub  You can find more details of the program here - https://clearcost.club/bountyterms.pdf  Register and take part in the formation of the project community on the bounty page of the campaign https://clearcost.ru/bounty   More about project www.clearcost.io  If you have any question about bountycontact with bounty manager: http://t.me/clearcostbounty
